desc: Craft beer , ciders and spirits. Click and colect or local deliveries. Eccles Salford Manchester.

layout.text:
This is the best way to see our live stock of the finest independent craft beer and cider producers the UK has to offer.
Opening Times -
Monday - CLOSED
Tuesday & Wednesday 4pm-9pm
Thursday 12-10pm
Friday & Saturday 12-10pm
Sunday 1-7pm
PLEASE NOTE WE ARE UNABLE TO SHIP PRODUCTS NATIONWIDE AT THIS MOMENT IN TIME
Contact thenortherntype@hotmail.com
23 Church Street, Eccles, Salford, M30 0DF
